modName: Sky fix lines or ripples bug
summary:
hey guys i struggled with this annoying bug with lines or riplles going over the sky.
so i found thise 2 files on a forum that just need to be copied into the data folder. and bing no more stupid buggy lines... hope it works for you ^^ cuz it surely did for me.
